Ingredients:
  • Fresh Brussels sprouts - 250 gms - Chop into half
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Clarified butter or ghee - 1/2 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Add 1 teaspoon of ghee over medium heated skillet pan
  • Next Arrange chopped Brussels sprouts as shown in picture
  • Let them roast for 2 minutes and flip them when they turned out golden brown color
  • Next roast the other side as well for more 2 minutes and add 1 teaspoon ghee
  • Each Brussels sprouts roasted well, sprinkle salt and pepper powder
  • Give it a nice mix or toss them, make sure each sprouts coated with salt and pepper
  • Serve hot or immediately ğŸ˜Š
